fieldUpdates.formula: if(LEN(Request_Account__r.BillingStreet )>0, Request_Account__r.BillingStreet& " " , "" ) & BR() & if(LEN(Request_Account__r.BillingCity )>0, Request_Account__r.BillingCity& ", " , "" )& if(LEN(Request_Account__r.BillingState )>0, Request_Account__r.BillingState& " " , "" )& if(LEN(Request_Account__r.BillingPostalCode )>0, Request_Account__r.BillingPostalCode,"") & BR() & If(LEN(Request_Account__r.BillingCountry ) >0, Request_Account__r.BillingCountry,"")
fieldUpdates.name: Billing Address

fieldUpdates.formula: if(LEN(Account.BillingStreet )>0, Account.BillingStreet& " " , "" ) & BR() & if(LEN( Account.BillingCity )>0, Account.BillingCity& ", " , "" )& if(LEN(Account.BillingState )>0, Account.BillingState& " " , "" )& if(LEN(Account.BillingPostalCode )>0, Account.BillingPostalCode,"") & BR() & If(LEN( Account.BillingCountry ) >0, Account.BillingCountry,"")
fieldUpdates.name: Populate the address from account

fieldUpdates.formula: if(LEN(Request_Raised_By__r.Street )>0, Request_Raised_By__r.Street& " " , "" ) & BR() & if(LEN( Request_Raised_By__r.City )>0, Request_Raised_By__r.City& ", " , "" )& if(LEN(Request_Raised_By__r.State )>0, Request_Raised_By__r.State& " " , "" )& if(LEN(Request_Raised_By__r.PostalCode )>0, Request_Raised_By__r.PostalCode,"") & BR() & If(LEN(Request_Raised_By__r.Country ) >0, Request_Raised_By__r.Country,"")
fieldUpdates.name: Shipping Address from User

fieldUpdates.formula: if(LEN(Request_Account__r.Street_Address__c )>0, Request_Account__r.Street_Address__c & " " , "" ) & BR() & TEXT(Request_Account__r.District__c)& " " & TEXT(Request_Account__r.State__c) & BR() & If(LEN(Request_Account__r.PIN_Code__c) >0, Request_Account__r.PIN_Code__c& " ","")
fieldUpdates.name: Shipping address

rules.fullName: New Case
Populate Address when Account is blank
rules.formula: Request_Account__c == null && RecordType.Name=='Collateral Request' && (ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Approved by Team Leader') || ISPICKVAL(Status, 'New') || ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Correction of Dispatch Quantity'))

rules.fullName: Populating address on Account Change
rules.formula: Request_Account__c != null && RecordType.Name=='Collateral Request' && ISCHANGED(Request_Account__c) && (ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Approved by Team Leader') || ISPICKVAL(Status, 'New') || ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Correction of Dispatch Quantity'))
